about.name: Nico Foundas
about.subtitle: Freelance Senior Software Engineer
about.description: Hi I am Nico a passionate software engineer with more than 7 years of experience and a focus in frontend development and project management. I help businesses build scalable, modern applications and optimize their development processes. My expertise extends to understanding and defining complex algorithms and domain specific contexts as well as closely collaborating with other colleagues in an international team.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: My professional journey and key projects that shaped my expertise in software development.

projects.title: Development of a ReactJs application for drawing and modifying roofs on 2D Canvases ·
projects.description: Using OpenLayers, my team and I have developed an application that is used to create interactive drawings in the area of building planning. I created complex algorithms for the automatic calculation of domain-specific functionalities and used current design standards to keep the web application accessible to the users. In addition to the professional and technical requirements review and the mentoring of less experienced colleagues, I took on the role of Product Owner for a period of 6 months and thus dedicated myself to the creation of requirements and project organization.
achievements: Implementation of complex vector based algorithms
Ensured code quality by  adding unit, integration and visual regression tests
Leading the project in the role of product owner
Keeping stakeholder up to date and discussing new features

projects.title: Angular application for document processing ·
projects.description: In the role of front-end lead, I was responsible for the development of a new Angular application. I was responsible for the architecture of the new app, as well as customizing the design according to customer requirements, connecting REST APIs and carrying out functional and technical tests to ensure the quality of the requirements.
achievements: Integration of excel file uploads with automated transformation to application models
Designing the new application from scratch

projects.title: Angular applications for contract management and visualization of vehicle data
projects.description: Planning and implementation of migrations and new developments. Development of several Angular applications with TypeScript and REST APIs with Kotlin and Java (Spring Boot). Implementation of functional and technical tests for quality assurance.
achievements: Built multiple client applications from scratch
